## Read Dataset 

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------


```{r}
head(iris)
```


Column {.sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------


```{r}
selectInput("Select attribute", label = "Select attribute",
             choices = c("Sepal.Length", "Sepal.Width", "Petal.Length", "Petal.Width"), selected = "Sepal.Length")


```


Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Count of Species

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = iris, aes(x= Species, y= Petal.Width))+
  geom_bar(stat= "identity",  fill = "dark green")+
  geom_text(aes(label = Petal.Width), vjust = -0.2)+
  ggtitle("Count of Species")
```

### Pie Chart 

```{r}
ggplot(iris, aes(x="", y=Petal.Width , fill=Species)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity", width=1) +
  coord_polar("y", start=0)
```
